thread.title: Lotus promotes reserve driver Jolyon Palmer for 2016
thread.title_full: Lotus promotes reserve driver Jolyon Palmer for 2016 - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Lotus promotes reserve driver Jolyon Palmer for 2016
text: Photo: Eric Gay, AP Workers hang a banner over the track at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Austin, Texas. Workers hang a banner over the track at the Formula One U.S. Grand... AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Lotus has promoted reserve driver Jolyon Palmer to a full-time seat for 2016. Workers hang a banner over the track at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Austin, Texas. Workers hang a banner over the track at the Formula One U.S. Grand... AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Lotus has promoted reserve driver Jolyon Palmer to a full-time seat for 2016.
